page.title: 01Sawbridgeworth and Sheering
page.content: Our "Domesday Block" is made up of two different areas -{Sawbridgeworth}and {Sheering. { Sawbridgeworth}is a small town built around the station and the main London to Cambridge railway line.It has good shopping facilities and offers various services such as banks and estate agents.Many people who live in Sawbridgeworth commute daily to London. {Sheering}is a village consisting of two parts-Upper and Lower Sheering which are about one mile apart.It is a rural area, mostly devoted to growing crops.Nearly all the people from Sheering find their employment outside the village. The Hertfordshire-Essex border runs through our "Domesday" area.Sheering is a part of Essex,while Sawbridgeworth is in Hertfordshire.
